Our Story

A Sanctuary
of Coffee & Craft

Rooted in the serene landscapes of Madinat Zayed, Thary Cafe is more than a destination—it's an experience. We merge the artistry of specialty coffee with the tranquility of nature.

Every cup is a testament to our dedication, sourced ethically and brewed with precision in an environment designed to slow down time.

Discover the Atmosphere →
The Menu

Signature Offerings

View Details

Farm Breakfast Plate

Locally sourced organic eggs, slow-roasted tomatoes, artisanal sourdough, and cultured butter.

View Details

V60 Pour Over

Single-origin Ethiopian beans, light roast with notes of jasmine, bergamot, and wild berries.

View Details

Espresso Entremet

Layers of coffee-soaked sponge, mascarpone mousse, and dark chocolate glaze.

The Environment

Quietly Luxurious,
Distinctly Natural.

Designed to be your escape. Whether for morning reflections or afternoon gatherings, our space adapts to your pace.
